website_summaries.verdict: A combination toner, refresher, and moisturizer with anti-aging effects.
pros: Smells great and works well for all skin types, from dry to oily
Helps clarify skin to prevent damage from pollution and aging
cons: Not hydrating enough to replace a moisturizing lotion or cream entirely

customer_reviews.title: Yippee
customer_reviews.text: I have had rosacea for years. This product was used at a spa I went to for a facial. It was highly recommended. Now, 3 months later, I use it every day. Why? Within one week my rosacea was at peace. Week two it was gone. In six weeks most of the scarring was gone and now, just a little tiny bit is showing. No one knows but me. I love it and use it for my entire face.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: great line of products
customer_reviews.text: I use & recommend the Eminence products. I know I am just words on a web page but I am old as dirt and have amazing skin, I think these products are part of the reason why (genetics too, of course)
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Love this Serum
customer_reviews.text: This serum makes me a fan of Eminence products. It helps with my sensitive, dry, rocacea prone skin. This serum calms my skin and minimizes the look of broken capillaries on my cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly combats redness
customer_reviews.text: My skin hasn't looked this great in years. My mom and I both have been struggling with allergic eczema around the nose and we both love this product because it balances out the skin and combats sensitive blotchiness.
customer_reviews.author: CANDYland

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rosacea.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for years! I have dry skin and mild rosacea which gets worse during the winter. This product really helps keep it in check. I also appreciate that Eminence products are cruelty-free and never tested on animals.
customer_reviews.author: shoe shopper

customer_reviews.title: Helps to Heal Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this for anyone who suffers from Rosacea. Use it with all of the chamomile products from Eminence~ cleanser, moisturizer, serum and masque. Even though they say there is no "cure" for rosacea, this comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Loveislikely

customer_reviews.title: Love this serum
customer_reviews.text: I have used many skin care serums and moisturizers during the year. The Eminence line is my favorite. It has natural ingredients and makes my skin very soft. I get compliments on my skin and people think I look younger than my 40s. The serum is not miracle against lines but I believe it softens them. I will be staying with the Eminence skin care products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have used this now for over 7 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this now for over 7 months and have not seen a reduction of forehead lines. Yet, I have not seen an increase. So I rate as a three. As I have not come across anything else to switch to I shall continue with the product.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: It's gentle on your face & softens deep lines beautifully. I'm on my 2nd bottle & will reorder ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little bottle of serum. It's gentle on your face & softens deep lines beautifully. I'm on my 2nd bottle & will reorder when it runs out
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am not even sure it does anything, just kinda moisturizes skin...
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lakes

customer_reviews.title: My favorite serum!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday! It's the best ever. Leaves my skin feeling smooth and also helps with any little outbreaks that pop up.
customer_reviews.author: catlady

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this every morning and night after I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this every morning and night after I wash my face and I think it's made a difference. My skin feels more supple
customer_reviews.author: L526

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Use it to get rid of Rosetta. Seems to work
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Mcintire

customer_reviews.title: Product works Execellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Using it has decreased greatly my need for traditional moisturizers. My skin feels soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: R. Werman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and a good price. I use it day and night right after cleanser. I am in my 60's and look much younger. I have tried more expensive products and like this better. Even my dermotoligist thinks has good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome serum! Use in conjuction with lotion or face oil, feels so fresh!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of Eminence Products. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Eminence Products. However, I have very sensitive skin and this product seemed to agitate it. No issues with the seller. Just not the right product for me.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Eminence Couperose-c Serum
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular Eminence serum product for my type of skin concern. It's okay. Makes my skin soft but I really don't notice that it is helping my facial redness.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: vit. c for the face
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I ever want to go without Eminince Courperose-c serum. Since I have been using it my face has benefitted highly from the serum. In fact, most people have no idea I am over 60, but think, due to my complexion that I am in my 40's.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for Reducing Redness
customer_reviews.text: I have mild rosacea and Eminence Couperose-C Serum works as well, or better, than the prescription medicine I had. I use it once, in the morning, under my make-up. I'd highly recommend it. BTW: The other Eminence products are excellent also.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: My one and only facial serum...
customer_reviews.text: Love this as my morning moisturizer. The tiniest drop covers my entire face and a bottle lasts me a good 3-4 months. Really an excellent product and worth a try if you're on the fence about spending the money.
customer_reviews.author: runningshell

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love knowing I am using a product that is completely natural, very little needs to be applied,and it works
customer_reviews.author: vicki ruiz

customer_reviews.title: My mom was recommended this after her double mastectomy to help with the ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom was recommended this after her double mastectomy to help with the scarring. Although she has seen some change in the few months she's used it, it has not helped as much as she had hoped and told it would
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome serum for evening skin tone!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT! I use it at night with my sweet red rose whip moisturizer and BAM in the am I have beautifully toned, moisturized skin. The age spots are kept at bay (I'm 38 and oily/combination hyper SENSITIVE skin) and I love this stuff. It only takes a DROP on a wet hand, mix with other wet hand and PAT all over face and neck. I wonder if people realize that patting product on gets a more even distribution than smearing it all over?? Pat people. PAT. PAT. PAT. You will know what I mean after a month (it takes 28 days about, for your skin to turn over so be patient!!)
customer_reviews.author: Picky Readers

customer_reviews.title: rosacea-skin looks and feels way better
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks, my rosacea-skin looks and feels way better. I have less redness, bumps and flushing after eating certain food is also less. I would order it again, because I have the idea that this is the only product that can help my skin feeling more or less normal. No reduction in skin flakes though.. If someone knows a solution for those, please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: No improvement for broken capillaries
customer_reviews.text: Almost done with the bottle and seeing no improvement for broken capillaries. I chose this product because it claimed to help remedy this facial embarrassment. Also, not as moisturizing as I thought. There are other facial serums on the market that work much better.
customer_reviews.author: fois99

customer_reviews.title: ...Made with organic fruits and vegetable and is great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: !I am an esthetician and I have oily and acne prone skin and in the summer months I use different moisturizers. In the summer I tend to go lighter and use water based moisturizers. Eminence is great for my skin type and the best part is that their products are derived from fruits and vegetable. I was introduced to Eminence while a student at Miller Motte Esthetic school located in Cary, NC and have been hooked ever since. www.frommetouessentials.com
customer_reviews.author: MsNC

customer_reviews.title: no more rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I get rosacea in the wintertime with the dry heat in the house. I started using this and have found a significant improvement. I only use it on my cheeks. I love this product because it contains natural ingredients. I try to avoid pharmaceutical drugs whenever possible.
customer_reviews.author: Weezy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great & I think it helps with my skin regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McGonigal

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: use this along with cleanser and moisturizer from this line. do your research as there are many types to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: bigsass

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed in quality of the product .
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing in quality in compare to what I have been using . Never buy this product from this seller ever . It's a totally waste of time and money , I thought I was saving some money but in reality I lost . Sorry guys but it was not good at all .
customer_reviews.author: rizwan a syed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Spider Veins on your Face
customer_reviews.text: Small red veins on your face are not attractive. Have not had luck with many products, but this one definitely minimizes the veins. I have only used it about 6 nights, but already attention is not drawn to the sides of my nose and the redness in the middle of my chin is fading. Every ingredient is natural and I am familiar with most of the ingredients. However, I am really surprised that once put together, they are working nicely to shrink and fade away my red veins. Many thanks to the person who took the time to figure out this very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Delight

customer_reviews.title: A great brand! Beware of authenticity~~~
customer_reviews.text: This is a serum I love. It helps improve texture and lightens my complexion. However, I've found that my purchase came in a disappointing condition - no seal; no box. I doubt its authenticity. I've read reviews of some Eminence products and found that I'm not the only one who receive suspected products. What we can do is to find a trustworthy seller. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Phoe nix

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this serum along with four other serums. And I can't say which ones are working or if it's the combination of all serums but I feel that my skin is looking so much better and starting to glow beautifully. I had so much acne and scars and slowing they are fading and my skin is smoothing out. I'm so glad that my skin didn't get so damaged when I had acne. I plan to keep using eminence products because they are organic, chemical-free, gmo-free, and they just smell awesome! I Love Eminence!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Pena

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Reacted poorly to this Line. It smells terrific and feels nice. It just breaks me out.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: No change in broken capillaries.
customer_reviews.text: Finished the bottle, see no change in the broken capillaries . I used it as a moisturiser at night half way through, when I realized that it does not work. It was OK, has natural ingredients, but I do not see much value in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: i've had this for about six months and it hasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: i've had this for about six months and it hasn't really done anything to help redness. it reduces my redness a little bit right after applying it, though i wouldn't say it helps long term
customer_reviews.author: Emma Strickland

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It evens out my skin tone and heals blemishes quickly. No sting, no smell, doesn't dry out my skin. I use it every night before moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Music lover

customer_reviews.title: Emnence Organic products are simply the best, I love them for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Emnence Organic products are simply the best, I love them for my sensitive skin. It was delivered quickly and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Mom

customer_reviews.title: very good, I recommended it
customer_reviews.text: An excelente product for rosácea, very, very good, I recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Castro Santiago

customer_reviews.title: This is my absolutely nuber 1 product from Eninence. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolutely nuber 1 product from Eninence. Makes my skin look brighter and fresh. Have beeing using it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: N. G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent serum, has helped control my rosacea and my skin is the best it’s been in a long time
customer_reviews.author: L. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Rosacea-Bump prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: Caused massive rosacea bump breakout on me, so if you have that type of skin problem, I'd avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: DashOneCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this keeps the skin supple and great for anti aging
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DePena

customer_reviews.title: This is great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great product I have used this for a few years. It makes the skin feel smooth and soft. One bottle lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Just Tess

customer_reviews.title: Just came
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant getting this because it's so difficult to try to find the right Eminence serum. I love this serum...feels wonderful on and my essential oils absorb better with this serum. I like this one more than the Acai Booster Firm skin serum by Eminence but maybe because my skin does not need the firm skin serum since I'm not at this stage of aging yet. I bought the Acai Booster serum because of the anti aging and not for the firmer skin benefits. This Couperosa-c serum feels better on my skin than the Acai Booster because it really absorbs unlike the Acai Booster.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to use this product for his Rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: SKuts

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturising
customer_reviews.text: This oil/serum is very moisturising and healing. If you are looking to avoid wrinkles, or want to reduce the ones you already have, you should give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this in conjunction with the Derma Roller and my skin loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Graphic Designer

customer_reviews.title: love couperose C serum
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum! I recently developed rosacea and would get red itchy bumps on my face. None of the prescription creams the dermatologist prescribed worked anywhere near as well as this serum. I keep getting told I have great skin again now that I've found this serum. The other products I've tried have also been great such as the sweet red rose cleanser, rosewhip moisturizer and the calming arnica masque are all fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I started to get broken red blood vessels on my face for some reason i googled and saw this, i am so glad i bought it...after 4 days in the morning and night of use i would say its at least 50% better , its not noticable to anyone else anymore but myself..I am so happy thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn laursen

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have had rosacea for the years, and this is the only product that has actually improved it. I order from this company because they are always prompt on sending the product.
customer_reviews.author: girlwholikestohavefun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product! Tried to use some thing else but worse
customer_reviews.author: Hannah N

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: i've ordered this product at least 3 times now. it's great, organic vitamin c...my skin is so happy and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Lee Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent serum
customer_reviews.text: I have used this serum for years and it is hands down the best facial serum. You can not go wrong with any Eminence product.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my rosacea. It definetely makes my cheeks look less dry. I have a mild form of rosacea. I expected the serum to reduce redness. It actually does but just a bit. I like the sensations though. It smells nice. I use only a drop for the red spots. I am pretty satisfied. I did not expect a miracle. Was delivered earlier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: if you want to spend money for nothing in return, then this is your product. Useless and too expensive! Not worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Pascale Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN USING THIS MOSTLY ON MY NECK AND UPPER CHEST AREA WHERE DAMAGE WAS FROM SUN BATHING AND TANNING BEDS AND IT SEEMS TO BE SLOWLY LESSENING THE PERMANANT REDDENING AND DAMAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Serum
customer_reviews.text: Awesome serum. I can't really afford to keep buying it but someday in the future I will treat myself to it. It helps balance out the skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: One quarter of the price I paid at the spa. This serum has made a huge difference in my complexion. One ounce lasted me 11 months. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Stellmaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is the best C serum I've ever found. Really makes me skin glow
customer_reviews.author: kimberlandia

product_meta.title: Eminence Couperose-c Serum, 1 Ounce
product_meta.description: Eminence Organics Couperose-C Serum(1 oz./30 ml)Benefits For sensitive, reactive, oily, rocacea, dehydrated and dry skin types This serum is an intensive nourishing, anti-irritant designed to assist in reducing inflamed or irritated areas immediately Couperose-C assists in the treatment of broken capillaries and rosacea, supplies high levels of Vitamin C and bioflavonoids Reduces trans-epidermal water lossThe epidermis will become visibly tighter with the natural abilities of lavender Skin tissues are deeply moisturized, and cells are repaired and duplicated by supplying essential nutrients Features Lavender and peppermint acts as an natural antiseptic Rosehip assists in regeneration Horsetail reduces inflammation and calms irritationEminence Organics is a highly effective, entirely organic skin care line. With all naturally organic ingredients these hand-made products are effective and extremely healing. Rich in vitamins, active ingredients and nutrients, Eminence products will give you immediate results that you will see and feel.
feature_bullets: Intensive nourishing, anti-irritant designed to assist in reducing inflamed or irritated areas immediately
Acts as a natural antiseptic along with the peppermint
